list_items: Added a users tag to box log filters.
Added the ability to set upload-defined variables when deploying a Peakboard application to a box.
Added functionality to display changes in the box overview without reloading the page.
Added information about the currently logged-in user to box function calls.
Added user settings to Hub Flow output lists.
Updated the UI for configuring the time server on a box.
Updated the password policy for box passwords.
Updated the password-change process to align with Peakboard Runtime changes.
Improved the UI for empty states to better guide users.
Improved performance when loading boxes in the box overview.
Improved box loading behavior when encountering boxes with broken certificates.
Improved usability in the box overview by remembering the state of box groups.
Added a hint indicating when no Peakboard Runtime update file is available during a box update attempt.
Fixed an issue where the restart button was missing in the box overview.
Fixed an issue when deleting rows in variable lists on a box.
Fixed an issue that prevented calling box functions when parameters with regex constraints were used.
Fixed incorrect data types when calling functions with parameters.
Fixed various UI issues on the box details page.
Added a flag that allows empty values for string value constraints.
Added functionality to automatically apply the column constraint to variables created via the binding dialog.
Updated the UI to improve usability when working with lists.
Improved file structure when downloading list data as CSV.
Improved performance when loading lists on the lists page.
Fixed an issue that prevented appending data when importing list data.
Fixed several minor issues related to list handling.
Fixed an issue where hidden list columns reappeared after reloading the page.
Fixed issues where lists could fail to load due to invalid user settings created in older Hub versions.
Fixed an issue where loading list data via plain SQL could fail.
Fixed an issue where empty strings always passed regex constraint validation.
Fixed an issue where the permission to delete rows did not work correctly.
Fixed an issue where multiple quotation marks were merged into a single one when importing list data.
Added a flag that allows empty values for string value constraints.
Added the ability to change a variable's data type and constraint.
Added functionality to display changes in the variable overview without reloading the page.
Added enforcement of constraints on remote data updates, including error messages for invalid values.
Improved the UI to better align with the Peakboard design.
Fixed an issue when updating values of string variables bound to a list.
Added functionality to show differences for .pbmx files in the file manager version overview.
Improved icons for a better look and feel.
Fixed an issue where the file manager was unusable in some cases.
Fixed an issue when overwriting existing files that were not visible to the current user.
Fixed an issue with aggregation steps in Hub Flows.
Fixed an issue with RSS feeds in Hub Flows.
Added a button to manually delete user invitations.
Updated the UI for a better look and feel.
Fixed an issue where user groups could not be deleted in certain cases.
Removed the Screenshot Only access right to simplify user group configuration.
